attributes.action: Laws for caravan parks site owners
attributes.additional_details: 80 to 100 people who have been sited on Sunnymede and Eastgates sites belonging to fantasy island owned by the Mellors leisure Ltd have just had the letters to say caravans older than 22 on March 1st 2024 need to be off site or give them thousands of pounds to upgrade thses people sold caravans right up to 6 weeks before the notification letter to owners
attributes.background: Make it illegal for site owners to change age rules for caravan owners who are sighted or bought on an agreed no age site landlords have laws to  adhere to protecting tennants why not caravan park owners

rejection.details:
Decisions about whether to impose age restrictions for caravans is a contractual matter for individual landowners, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Public Inquiry into Unfair Trading Practices of Holiday Caravan Park Owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553515
